pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Tibanna_ffThis is an extension of Tibanna that integrates with 4DN/CGAP data portals.[![Python 3.6](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.6-blue.svg)](https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-360/) ![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/4dn-dcic/tibanna_ff.svg?branch=master)
